Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 94.47

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Metal Blending Roll, 4 in x 30 ft S MED, 3 per case

  • Our Scotch-Brite™ Metal Blending Roll is specifically designed with heat-resistance and finishing properties that support blending and finishing on stainless steel, and doubles up as a good general cleaning sheet roll
  • Choose this sheet roll to blend surface scratches on many metals, wood, and synthetic surfaces.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

  • Silicon carbide mineral in medium grade coarseness works efficiently on weld burns and cleaning stainless steel cooking tops

  • Comes in a variety of widths to fit various tools and can be sized according to the application
